summary: You’re Not His Mother - Harry Potter x Godmother Reader
title: You’re Not His Mother - Harry Potter x Godmother Reader
body:
Word Count: 1,018 

Warnings: Swear word, arguments, angst to happy ending

Prompt/Request: Y/N L/N, Harry Potter’s godmother, gets in an argument with the famous Molly Weasley about Harry. (Very Platonic)

Authors Note: so you pretty much take the place of Sirius Black in this, like you were James best friend, and etc. Also takes place in Order Of The Phoenix. And I fucking love Sirius btw and i don’t have the book on me so the dialog might not be correct. And requests are open if interested.

Tucked away on a strange street in Islington, Claremont Square,  lies the location of Y/N L/N’s family residence; Number 12 Grimmauld Place. Inside said place has a tension as thick as cement, as the Order watch and listen apprehensively as Molly Weasley and current owner of said house argue.

“Harry is too young to know! He is not prepared, and does not need to know!” The red headed mother shouted, face red as she stared into Y/N’s glossed E/C eyes. Molly’s children stayed silent, each having a different expression, but looked pitifully at the woman that was receiving the backlash. Fred and George both had a raised eye brow and ghost of a smirk on their lips. Ginny just sat there with a nervous look, knowing how awful her mother could get with words. Ron was sitting there, wondering how harry could be unprepared, seeing as all the shit hes been through. Harry looked as like he was going too defend his godmother, but was cut off.

“Unprepared my ass. He has been through more than most of the people here.” Retorted Y/N, her facial expression hard. “And, correct me if i’m wrong, but Harry has been face to face with Voldemort 4 times, hasn’t he? And he was almost killed almost every year because he was not informed, or was not taken serious. So, frankly it seems most compelling to him now.” She finished, taking a glance at her godson, who had a face full of surprise, seeing as he had never been defended as so. Molly’s face somehow turned redder, she shrieked out her, some members wincing from the noise.

“He isn’t even 16! I have been taking care of him as much as i can sense he was eleven, i would know whats good for him.” Nobody spoke. Y/N lowered her eyes and said quietly, but loud enough for everyone to hear,

“He’s not your son…”

“He’s as good as my son,” molly spoke fiercely. “who else has he got?”

“He’s got me!” the woman shouted.

“Yes,” The gingered sneered, her lip curling. “The thing is, it’s been rather difficult for you look after him while you’ve been locked up in Azkaban, hasn’t it?” Y/N’s stance faltered, her body became ridged, and guilt clouded her mind, knowing so much could have changed if she didn’t go to Azkaban, if she stayed the secret keeper for James and Lily, if she hadn’t let Wormtail get away.

Everybody was shocked at her words. The Weasley children were all staring at their mother with gaping mouths and wide eyes. Y/N’s posture slightly changed, her back straight eyes wide, and her hand tightly griped on her wand, half of her wanting to pull it up, but the the other half thinking of what Harry would think of her, and the Weasley children, who she had grown accustomed too. Remus stood up, fist clenched.

“How dare you.” everyone looked up to Y/N’s right, surprised to see harry standing there, his wand out, pointing it at Molly, most surprised to see him against her. He growled out, glaring. “You have no right to talk to her that way.” Y/N reached out her hand and lowered Harry’s wand. She had a sarcastic smile on her face, but her eyes had a mix of sadness and guilt in her eyes, all her past mistakes swarming in her mind.

“She’s right… It is my fault, I convinced them to pick Wormtail as the keeper, which I have regretted everyday of my life sense. I should have gotten Wormtail and chased him down. i should have tried harder to escape Azkaban, but a little self punishment isn’t that bad, is it? But enough about me, this is about Harry. I am his godmother, and I say that he is allowed to know what he wants.” She spoke calmly and closed her eyes. “Now if you’ll excuse me.” Y/N disappeared up the stairs.

Harry turned back towards Mrs. Weasley and glared strongly. As did Remus. Some members stared at her with wide eyes. Molly lowered her eyes, and muttered an excuse and left for the kitchen. Harry turned towards the stair case and started heading for the woman’s bedroom.

After quietly walking past the portraits that creamed profanities when they saw him, he stopped in front of a large back door, Y/N L/N written in fancy lettering. He hesitantly knocked on the door twice. After a minute or so, the door opened and there stood Y/N, her eyes red and hair a mess. She stared sadly down at him. Before she could utter a word, Harry quickly wrapped his arms around her stomach and buried his head into her chest. She stood still for a moment, eyes wide, unsure of what to do. she carefully wrapped her arms around his shoulder. Her eyes slightly watering as she looked down at the child, noticing the similar hair and skin tone of her best friend’s son. After a minute, she gingerly unwrapped her arms and brought him into her room.

“I uh, I’m sorry you had to see that, and uh, how i acted towards her.” Y/N spoke softly and avoided eye contact, thinking he probably had plenty of respect for Molly, seeing as how she was trying to protect him. He just looked up at you and spoke,

“She had no right to talk to you that way. It was not your fault they died. It was Wormtail’s, and Voldemort’s.” she looked down at him and smiled.

“Thank you Harry. And, seeing as this is our first moment alone, and i’m sure they will not need us for some time, i would be happy to answer any questions you have, about anything.”

The two then talked for the rest of the night, Harry asking questions of the Order, his mother and father, her time at Hogwarts, and Y/N answer to everything, even asking some questions about harry. They were not interrupted, for Remus was trying his best to let the two relish in the peace that the two had for once, since that dreadful day in October

title: For We Are Stardust
body:
by Arlow_Ahern

“She could tell that he wanted to remain an enigma to her, but Audrey entertained the thought of staring his blank exterior into non-existence; she’d gently unravel him until there would be nothing left to hide behind, only the pillars of all physiological structure.
And there, between the remains of exploding stars that build all life billions of years ago, woven into those tiny fragments of unimaginable proportions, she would lay bare his golden stardust soul.”

Harry Potter Headcanon

After Mr and Mrs Granger have forgotten about Hermione and moved to Australia, they decide to have a child and they have a daughter. Aged 4, strange things start happening around her and the Grangers are reintroduced to the wizarding world! Just an idea 😂

trail.content_raw:
by Arlow_Ahern

“She could tell that he wanted to remain an enigma to her, but Audrey entertained the thought of staring his blank exterior into non-existence; she’d gently unravel him until there would be nothing left to hide behind, only the pillars of all physiological structure.
And there, between the remains of exploding stars that build all life billions of years ago, woven into those tiny fragments of unimaginable proportions, she would lay bare his golden stardust soul.”

▪ ▪ ▪ ▪ ▪

Audrey Simmons is an explosion of colour and scent in a world that has been struck blind by war and robbed of all its senses;

Percy Weasley is a broken man, trying to piece a life back together that used to make sense, before everything came apart.

When they collide, it’s the sun aligning with the moon, meeting in an infinite eclipse beneath the slow dance of dying stars.

▪ ▪ ▪ ▪ ▪

summary: “Sirius was lounging in his chair at his ease, tilting it back on two legs. He was very good-looking, his dark hair fell into...
caption:
“Sirius was lounging in his chair at his ease, tilting it back on two legs. He was very good-looking, his dark hair fell into his eyes with a sort of casual elegance neither James’s nor Harry’s could ever have achieved, and a girl sitting behind him was eyeing him hopefully, though he didn’t seem to have noticed.”

Harry: Why are you angry with me?
Draco: Well, think about it
Harry: I haven't done anything wrong!
Draco: You told Blaise that...
body:
Harry: Why are you angry with me?
Draco: Well, think about it
Harry: I haven't done anything wrong!
Draco: You told Blaise that he looked fine in that shirt the other day
Harry *laughing*: Are you jealous because of that?
Draco: Don't talk to me anymore, Potter!
